channel.title: SHH:600019 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in SHH:600019 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China’s Baosteel in Discussions on Steel Investments From Asia to Africa
item.description: China’s Baoshan Iron & Steel Co. is in discussions with several potential partners about investing in steel projects, with the primary focus on Asia, the Middle East and North Africa.
